author: Josh.5
description:
Specify paths for Unmanic to ignore within your library path.

Enter line-separated regex.

Examples:
 [list][*][color=red]^.*.*\(.*\).*\..*$[/color] - Ignore files and folders containing parentheses '()' [*][color=red]^.*\/\.ignore_folder\/.*$[/color] - Ignore folders containing '/.ignore_folder/' [/list]
name: Path Ignore
